structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, A, 29, (1) at 623.
